title: French Officials Investigate Hack Of Television Network
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish interviews Damien Leloup, a technology writer for the French paper Le Monde, about the cyberattack on the French global TV network, TV5Monde.
contentencoded:
NPR's Audie Cornish interviews Damien Leloup, a technology writer for the French paper Le Monde, about the cyberattack on the French global TV network, TV5Monde, by a group calling itself the "Cybercaliphate."

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
